title: Adapt to change or leave the land
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Country life - Psychological aspects
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm life - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
description: As Tom Carroll reflects on five generations of his family and their land at Mudgeegonga in northern Victoria. In doing so, he recalls the various challenges his ancestors faced, as well as the changes they needed to accomodate, much in the same way he has to today.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002207; The Drought : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2008
